Info.Description: This module describes the common data elements for left atrial size

NumericDataElement.Label: Left atrial volume during end systole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Measure LA volume during end-systole (ventricular systole), where it should be highest, and normalize to BSA (mL3)

NumericDataElement.Label: Left Atrial volume during end diastole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Measure LA volume (mL3) during end-diastole (ventricular diastole), where it should be lowest, and normalize to BSA (mL3)

NumericDataElement.Label: Left Atrial diameter during end systole
NumericDataElement.Hint: Measure LA diameter during end-systole (ventricular systole), where it should be highest (mm)

NumericDataElement.Label: Left atrial ejection fraction
